resources.string: "I have a master\'s of Computer Science from DePaul University, Software Development concentration and a lot of experience in Android App Development"

"I worked five months as a Mobile Application Developer in a company called Resilience. I gained a lot of experience working there. The first three months I had to understand a written project by another developer and debug, revise and optimize it. The last two months I led the front-end team and trained the new interns by assigning them homeworks.
 
I also was a Teaching Assistant during my master's program at DePaul. I used to grade the assignments and help students in their studies in case of having problems in their homeworks.

I have developed nine Android applications which I did eight of them individually and one as a group project. I also developed an Android/iOS app during my internship program at Resilience."
